---
title: "DeKCD - Formats and standards - Draft"
---

**Common Formats are an important part of being FAIR**

* [SBML, Systems Biology Markup Language](https://sbml.org/)

* [PE Tab, "data format for specifying parameter estimation problems in systems biology"](https://petab.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

* [BioPAX, "a standard language that aims to enable integration, exchange, visualization and analysis of biological pathway data"](https://www.biopax.org/)

* [CellML, to store and exchange computer-based mathematical models, based on XML](https://www.cellml.org/)

* [MIASE, Minimum information about a simulation experiment](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Minimum_information_about_a_simulation_experiment)

* [SBGN, Systems Biology Graphical Notation](https://sbgn.github.io/)

* [SED-ML, Simulation Experiment Description Markup Language](https://sed-ml.org/)

* [RO-Crate](https://www.researchobject.org/ro-crate/) , 
[RO-Crate specs](https://www.researchobject.org/specs/)

* [Oxford Common File Layout](https://ocfl.io/)

* [Sharable Content Object Reference Model (SCORM)](https://adlnet.gov/past-projects/scorm/)
